overview:
Serial entrepreneur focused on on-line gaming.

Companies (co)founded by David include

2007 - FSB Technology (UK) Ltd. - co-founder and COO - an innovative approach to generating sports betting revenues through the use of fantasy sports. Voted industry’s “next big thing” at the EIG launchpad in 2008. Customers include Skybet, 188BET and Metro newspapers. www.fsbtech.com

2000 - GameAccount - co-founder and CEO - the on-line gaming industry’s largest skill-games network, serving industry giants William Hill, Paddy Power, Lottomatica, Intralot, SportingBet and many more. www.gameaccountnetwork.com

1995 - Ucentrik - co-founder and CFO - pioneers of one-on-one communication technology using voice and video over the internet for adult education, product training and technical support. www.ucentrik.com
